name: AST Visitor Base Pattern
description: Base visitor classes for Python AST traversal during code analysis. Includes concrete visitors for magic literals (CoM), parameter bombs (CoP), god objects (CoA), and cyclomatic complexity.
example_usage:
from library.components.analysis.ast_visitor_base import BaseConnascenceVisitor, VisitorContext
class MyVisitor(BaseConnascenceVisitor):
    def get_violation_type(self): return 'custom'
    def visit_FunctionDef(self, node): ...
